parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh-CN: Chinese
*   en-US (default): English

parameters.name: AddressPoolName
parameters.description: Address pool name, supports fuzzy search for the entered address pool name.

parameters.name: AddressPoolType
parameters.description:
Address pool type, supports precise query for address pool types:
- IPv4
- IPv6
- domain

parameters.name: AvailableStatus
parameters.description:
Address pool availability status, supporting precise queries for address pool availability:
- available: Available
- unavailable: Unavailable

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: EnableStatus
parameters.description:
Address pool enable status, supports precise query of address pool enable status:
- enable: Enabled status
- disable: Disabled status

parameters.name: HealthStatus
parameters.description:
The health state of the address pool. You can enter a health state for exact search. Valid values:

ok: The health state of the address pool is normal and all addresses that are referenced by the address pool are available.

ok_alert: The health state of the address pool is warning and some of the addresses that are referenced by the address pool are unavailable. However, the address pool is deemed normal. In this case, only the available addresses are returned for Domain Name System (DNS) requests.

exceptional: The health state of the address pool is abnormal and some or all of the addresses that are referenced by the address pool are unavailable. In this case, the address pool is deemed abnormal.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: Current page number, starting from 1, default is 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of rows per page when paginating queries, with a maximum value of 100 and a default of 20.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: Address pool remarks, supporting fuzzy search for the input remarks.
